commandDescription: Validates alignment between XML and CSV representations of object translations using string comparison or logic comparison
inputFlagDescription: Comma-separated list of object translation names to validate (format: ObjectName-Language). If not specified, all object translations will be validated
modeFlagDescription: Validation mode: 'string' for full string comparison, 'logic' for in-memory structure comparison (default: %s)
noItemsFound: No object translations found to validate
validationSummary: Validation Summary: %s object translations validated, %s aligned, %s misaligned, %s warnings
